General.Name: LPP S.A.
General.Description: LPP SA designs, manufactures, distributes, and retails clothing for women, men, and children. It offers apparel, accessories, and footwear under the Reserved, Cropp, House, Mohito, and Sinsay brands. The company sells its products through offline and online stores in Poland and internationally. LPP SA was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Gdansk, Poland.
